title: irakkamurAmal
sahitya:
irakkamurAmal nI irukkalAmO murugA eLiyEn enniDam tuLiyEnum anbuDan


anupallavi

  marakkAdunadu nAma mahimaiyai dinamum nAn karuttODu manam karaiyak-karudinAlum


caraNam    karuNaiyin uruvAga karum kaDalinOram tiruk-kATSi tarum perum ATSikk-uriyavA
porumai enadai iduvarai sheida shOdanai pOdum ayyE pinnum shOdanai EdukkaiyE
